Flow.description: Removed [Case].LastModifiedById <>[Case].Parent.OwnerID and moved to new action. Change status Tech Feed

value.stringValue: AND(not(isnew()), CONTAINS([Case].RecordType.Name, "Backline") , NOT(ISPICKVAL( [Case].Status , "Draft") ), OR (ISPICKVAL( [Case].Status , "Submit"), ISPICKVAL( [Case].Status , "Closed")), ISCHANGED([Case].Status ), [Case].OwnerId <>[Case].Tech_Support__c )

AND(not(isnew()), CONTAINS([Case].RecordType.Name, "Backline") , NOT(ISPICKVAL( [Case].Status , "Draft") ), NOT(ISCHANGED([Case].Status )), NOT(ISCHANGED([Case].Feed_Body_Post_b__c )), NOT( ISCHANGED([Case].OwnerId)), ISCHANGED([Case].LastModifiedDate ) )
